campgrounds.name: Beaver Point Resort
campgrounds.description: Nestled on the shores of Tchesinkut Lake, Beaver Point Resort rests on a large, beautiful property surrounded by lush forests. We are a family-oriented campground, ideal for families to spend quality time and create unforgettable memories. We have different types of accommodations to suit all needs, including cabins, cottages, and campsites. All are located along the lakeshore and have fantastic views of the lake and wilderness. Our family campground has grassed sites with electricity and water, as well sites with full-service hook-ups and gravel pads. Stay in our rustic cabins which features electric lights, fridge and heaters. A propane cookstove is provided to create delicious meals. The cozy cottages are equipped with a kitchen and comfortable beds. Choose from our one or two bedroom cottages, whichever suits your needs. We have various amenities throughout the resort to create a comfortable experience. Bring your boat as we have a fantastic boat launch and boat trailer storage. We have boats, motors and kayaks available for rent. Spend your summer days by the lake with the whole family.

sites.name: Partial Service RV Sites - Electric and Water
Full Service RV Sites (Water, Sewer and 30 Amp Service)

campgrounds.name: Capilano River RV Park
campgrounds.address: 295 Tomahawk Ave., North Vancouver, BC V7P 1C5
campgrounds.description: RV parking & camping in Vancouver, also tenting. The most direct in Vancouver on Hwy 1. Exit Capilano Road S. Or Hwy 99 Exit N. Van. Off Lions Gate Bridge. OAP rates, special winter rates.

campgrounds.name: Gallagher Lake | A Parkbridge Camping & RV Resort
campgrounds.description: Located on the stunning Gallagher Lake in the South Okanagan Valley, Gallagher Lake RV Resort is surrounded by magnificent Ponderosa pines. The perfect destination for family camping, our resort is equipped with modern facilities to make a comfortable stay. With unmatched and consistent good weather, days will be spent at our private sandy beach soaking in the sun. Choose your choice of accommodation at Gallagher Lake RV Resort, whether it’s a RV site, rustic tent sites or cabin rentals, we have your priorities covered. Take advantage of the array of amenities we provide, including a tennis court, internet, coffee bar and grocery store on site, and washroom facilities. Hop on your bike or enjoy a scenic walk along the beautiful trails that are located only a short distance away from our resort. Our family oriented resort is located 10 minutes from Oliver, and a close drive to Penticton and Osoyoos to visit award winning wineries and vineyards.

campgrounds.name: Golden Golf Club RV Park
campgrounds.address: 576 Golf Course Drive Golden, BC V0A 1H0
campgrounds.description: Located in the Rocky Mountains, the Golden Golf Club R.V. Park is just minutes west of Golden, B.C. Adjacent the RV Park is our 18 hole golf course, practice facilities, restaurant, mini-golf course and in close proximity to Kicking Horse Mountain Resort, hiking, cycling trails and Golden Town Centre. CP 48 hours. Free WiFi.

campgrounds.name: Rondalyn | A Parkbridge Camping & RV Resort
campgrounds.description: A beautiful forested Parkbridge Resort with a big rig friendly park on Halsam Creek is the ideal destination for families to have a fun filled vacation. Offering year round accommodation, we welcome guests to stay with us during any season. Your RV and camping experience will be the best one yet at our resort, so book online for reservations! Whether your RV is a small or large, our partial or full service sites are spacious and private to suit any size RV. We have sites closer to amenities or more secluded, providing different options for every need. Don’t have an RV? We offer an exclusive tenting area with secluded or open sites available. Our resort has easy access to four golf courses, hiking and biking trails, fishing, swimming and other attractions and activities. The kids will love our on-site playground, perfect to meet new friends! For your convenience, we have clean washrooms and showers, a heated pool, year round hot tub, nine hole golf course, and trout pond available for use.

campgrounds.name: Willingdon Beach Municipal Campsite
campgrounds.address: 4845 Marine Ave Powell River, BC V8A 5T3
campgrounds.description: We are an 83 site (RV and tenting), municipal campground on the ocean, in the heart of Powell River, on the Sunshine Coast of BC. We are located next to a park, playground and the beach. Surrounded by beautiful hiking and walking trails, there is lots to see and do!

campgrounds.name: 'Ksan Campground
campgrounds.description: We here at the ‘Ksan Campground welcome guests with open arms. Come here for tenting and full-service sites. We are located near the Historical Pioneer Village of Hazelton and directly beside the Ksan Historic Museum and Village. Our small little town has various places for tourists to wander to and explore. Right down the street from us is the Tri-Town Theatre showing modern movies at competitive prices. Come stay with us! If you have questions, feel free to call or email us and we will help you.

campgrounds.name: 4 All Seasons Resort
campgrounds.address: 3464 Yellow Point Rd RR3 Ladysmith, BC V9G 1E6
campgrounds.description: A family owned camping facility, situated on inside coast of Vancouver Island on the Cedar peninsula, covered by mature trees and bounded by beautiful rock beaches over 100 sites in a treed setting. 3 night minimum stay for long weekends.

campgrounds.name: Acacia Grove RV Park & Cabins
campgrounds.address: 3814 Riverview Ave E Spences Bridge, BC V0K 2L0
campgrounds.description: Located in the historic community of Spences Bridge, Acacia Grove RV Park & Cabins is situated on a lush setting overlooking the famous Thompson River. Our well-appointed duplex and triplex cabins are self-contained with air conditioning, fully-equipped kitchens, two or three beds, and picnic tables. All the cabins have fantastic views of the roaring river. The RV Park is situated on a landscaped setting surrounded by beautiful trees to provide shade. We offer full hookup, pull thru and tenting sites, accommodating to everyone’s needs. For your convenience, free hot showers, flush toilets, and a laundromat is available for use. Also, a small convenience store, pay phones, game room, horseshoes, lawn bowling, volleyball and more are on-site. Our excellent location is ideal for sportsmen, families and nature lovers! Enjoy the Thompson River, famous for steelhead fishing, whitewater rafting and mountain sheep. Endless amount of outdoor activities to keep the family busy and fantastic weather to enjoy the outdoors.

campgrounds.name: Airport Inn Motel & RV Park
campgrounds.description: Full hook-up, pull-thru and tenting sites available. WiFi, laundry, playground, firepits, horseshoe pits and walking trails nearby.

campgrounds.name: Alamo Motel & RV Park
campgrounds.description: 21 sites with electrical hook-ups, pull thru sites. Flush toilets, showers, sewer and restaurant onsite. RV Park open seasonally. Water shut-off in October, weather dependent.

campgrounds.name: Alder Bay RV Park & Marina
campgrounds.address: 1 Alder Bay Rd. Port McNeill, BC V0N 2R0
campgrounds.description: With a relaxed and family friendly atmosphere, we are a great location to get away from the hustle bustle and stress of daily life. At Alder Bay you're just as likely to meet up with a local island family from the nearby community of Port McNeill as you are to find yourself in a friendly conversation with RVers from Germany or Switzerland! Alder Bay Resort is ideally suited to be the focal point of your Northern Vancouver Island adventure. With 30 acres of private land including abundant walk-on waterfront Alder Bay RV Park and Marina welcomes you and your family! Our park includes over 100 fully-serviced and non-serviced RV and tent sites. We can accommodate everything from small pop-ups to the big rigs. On site are public washrooms, shower rooms, and laundry facilities. Our camp store is stocked with essentials, there is WiFi available for purchase plus firewood and propane is also available. We also have a sani-dump, potable water stations, boat wash station and picnic shelter all at your disposal. Alder Bay is your access to the Broughtons so take advantage of our protected marina with over 40 slips, fish cleaning station, boat launch facilities and ample parking and get out on the water and explore! We also have long term storage so come on up and leave your boat or RV here for safekeeping until your next visit. Don’t feel like cooking? Then come and enjoy our funky soul food at Roxy’s Diner! https://www.roxysdiner.ca. In addition to classic fare - burgers and fish & chips - you'll also find some tasty Mexican specialties - tacos, chilaquiles and more. Enjoy the sunset on our beautiful fully licensed patio on the seashore or take advantage of our take out service by ordering online at https://www.roxysdiner.ca/s/order. Call our office ( 250-956-4117) for all the details or check out our web page and book online at [https://www.alderbay.com/book-now.html](). Looking to add a little adventure to your stay with us? Check out some of our Alder Bay Adventures under our activities page on our website. Whale Watching, Fishing , Grizzly Bear Tours is just a few of the available options right from our bay! We welcome Canadian Winter Snowbirds with open arms.

campgrounds.name: Aloha Trailer Park & Campground
campgrounds.address: 29666 Fraser Hwy C-9 Abbotsford, BC V4X 1V2
campgrounds.description: Full or partial RV hookups, tenting, coin showers, laundry, store with gas/propane and bus stop nearby. No fires permitted. Minutes from attractions and shopping centre. Weekly and off-season rates. Reservations not accepted, first come, first serve basis. Cash only.

campgrounds.name: Alpine Meadows Resort
campgrounds.address: 3400 Dunn Lake Road Clearwater, BC V0E 1N0
campgrounds.description: Situated on the hilltop above Hallamore Lake, Alpine Meadows RV Park is just beyond the Resort’s entrance, surrounded by the majestic forest in BC’s beautiful Dunn Peak Provincial Park. Our RV sites provide guests with spacious asphalt pads and grass area to create a comfortable stay. Each of our 17 sites offer full hookup and a modern washroom and shower facility. All of our resort amenities are offered and a close walking distance from your site. Visit our Boathouse Restaurant during breakfast and dinner, and indulge in fresh cuisine made from local ingredients. During the evenings, relax at our Fireside Lounge and Barbecue Area. Take advantage of our boat and fishing equipment rentals for a day of fishing on Hallamore Lake. The kids will enjoy our outdoor Activity Centre that offers games, a ping pong table, playground, mega-size chess, and generous green area.

campgrounds.name: Anahim Lake Resort & RV Park
campgrounds.address: 2799 Reed Rd Anahim Lake, BC V0L 1C0
campgrounds.description: Anahim Lake Resort lies on the eastern slope of the Coastal Mountain region in BC's Chilcotin. Situated on the shore of Anahim Lake panoramic views of the mountains are a daily treat. The resort offers the vacationer Rustic Simplicity, top-notch down-home service and excellent fishing. Accommodations include cozy cabins, RV and lakeshore campsites. We also offer boat and motor rentals, trail riding, flight seeing, fly-in fishing, guided spring chinook salmon fishing, hiking and fish smoking; try wind surfing or you can just relax and watch the time go by. Casual dress is the norm not the exception.To make the most of your visit to our area, binoculars, cameras and fishing gear are essential.

campgrounds.name: Anmore Camp & RV Park
campgrounds.description: Centrally located to Vancouver. Entrance to Buntzen Lake. Quiet. Park Setting. Security Gate. Full hookups. Firepits. Showers. Laundry. Store. Sports court. Canoeing. Fishing. Open by Appointment Oct - Mar 31.

campgrounds.name: Apple Beach RV Park
campgrounds.description: Apple Beach is a small, family-run RV Park and campground. We operate a simple, pleasant RV Park on beautiful Tucelnuit Lake. Simply put, Apple Beach is a quiet, friendly park in a lovely location. One firepit on the beach. Big Rig Friendly sites shaded by mature willows. Quiet pets accepted. Rates on website. Trailer rentals available. Snowbird rates.

campgrounds.name: Apple Valley Orchard & RV Park
campgrounds.description: RV Park in and around existing orchard groves of apples, peaches and cherries. Great valley view and close to all amenities. Very private and quiet. Nestled in the beauty of the Glenmore Valley, in the heart of the Okanagan Wine Country. 15 minutes to two lakes and a dozen golf courses. Weekly and monthly rates available.

campgrounds.name: Armstrong Kin RV Park
campgrounds.description: Situated in the heart of Armstrong, Armstrong Kin RV Park offers landscaped sites with full hookups of 30 amp electricity, water and sewer. We offer some shaded and pull through sites for larger RVs. Stay connected during your trip with our WiFi. For your convenience and comfort we have clean, full washrooms which include free showers. We are conveniently located behind the fairgrounds and across the street from Memorial Park and Pool. Bring the whole family as they will be entertained throughout the day! Discover the beauty of this small farming town and its outdoor activities. Many farms and orchards decorate the landscape of Armstrong. Visit Wild Mountain Honey Farm and purchase tasty sweet honey, or pick delicious apples at Maw’s Orchard. The kids will love Chickadee Ridge, Canada’s largest miniature horse farm! Pet and meet the tiny horses and other farm animals.

campgrounds.name: Arosa Ranch
campgrounds.address: 1 Arosa Ranch Road Bridesville, BC V0H 1Y0
campgrounds.description: Just twenty kilometres from Osoyoos, BC, nestled in the rolling Okanagan hills and surrounded by wildlife, Arosa Ranch is a peaceful and picturesque getaway.  Our Bed & Breakfast Rooms, Cabins, and Campground/RV Park, are the perfect place for a quiet retreat to nature, a vacation with friends and family, or your next celebration, event or retreat.

campgrounds.name: Arrowvale Riverside Campground and Cottages
campgrounds.address: 5955 Hector Rd. Port Alberni, BC V9Y 9E8
campgrounds.description: Nestled on lush riverside grounds in beautiful Port Alberni, Arrowvale Riverside Campground & Cottages offers a traditional camping experience. With picturesque vistas surrounding our property, you’ll find it easy to sit back and relax. Choose from one of our 40 campsites with many situated near the Somass River. We offer open and wooded sites with some being serviced and others unserviced. Our grounds have fantastic walking trails, swimming and fishing along the Somass River, a great way to spend the day with the whole family. Guests wanting to sleep indoors are treated to our charming cedar cottages with luxurious features. Relax under the vaulted wooden ceilings while sitting by the see-through gas fireplace. The cottage features one queen and a futon bed, sleeping up to four guests. Other amenities that guests are treated to include free showers, WiFi and restrooms. Seasonal services that are featured at our resort are a café, serving delicious baked goods, and free farm tours, where the kids will enjoy petting the farm animals.

campgrounds.name: Ashcroft Legacy Park Campground
campgrounds.description: Camp in desert country on the shores of the Thompson River, next to downtown historic Ashcroft. Legacy Park provides a shady, relaxing oasis. Easy walking distance to downtown Ashcroft for shopping, restaurants and tourist attractions. The 15 site park offers washrooms, showers, laundry facilities and sani dump station. Sites have power, water and free WiFi.

campgrounds.name: Bailey Bridge Campsite & Cabins
campgrounds.description: Your hosts, Keith and Val, invite you to enjoy your stay with us on the banks of the Bella Coola River. Whether it be secluded, wilderness or spacious campsites or cabins, all are available while you enjoy world class river fishing for salmon and trout or as a base for your hiking or touring adventures. Take advantage of the many hiking areas or utilize other services in the Valley such as ocean excursions, river drifting, nature tours or heli-hiking.

campgrounds.name: Banbury Green RV & Camping Resort
campgrounds.description: Nestled away from the city noise, Banbury Green RV & Camping Resort is a peaceful destination for families wanting a fun and relaxing vacation. Our resort is a family-oriented campground with attractively kept lawns and flowerbeds. We have an abundance of shaded areas to stay cool during the warmer days. We accommodate for most RVs and tents, and all sites have electricity and water. Most of our sites are lakefront to maximize the breathtaking views. Picnic tables are at each site for families to eat their meals or play board games. We have plenty of open space for the kids to run around and ride their bikes. Enjoy the serene lake on our pedal boat and canoe rentals. We have a generous size grass area with a net for volleyball or badminton, a fun way for families to spend quality time. After a fun filled day visit our store and indulge the whole family to ice cream and other frozen treats!

campgrounds.name: Barney's Lakeside Resort & Bistro
campgrounds.address: 3556 Puntzi Lake Road Chilanko Forks, BC V0L 1H0
campgrounds.description: Relax in the peace and quiet of the Chilcotin. Wildlife abounds with deer, moose, bear, wild horses, fox and numerous species of birds. A 12-acre lakeside resort, located on beautiful Puntzi Lake. The lake (approximately 11km lon and 5km. Fishing for wild rainbow trout and kokanee salmon. Hunting, wildlife viewing, hiking, mountain biking, ATVing, water and jet ski, swimming ice fishing and snowmobiling. We are halfway from Williams Lake to Bella Coola, make Barneys your Home Base and experience the Chilcotin.
